keyMoments.title: Itomimizu Debuts as Davy Back Fight Announcer
keyMoments.description: Itomimizu appears riding his giant bird Chuchun, introducing himself as the official announcer and referee for the Davy Back Fight competition.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the formal structure of the Davy Back Fight and provides exposition about the rules.
keyMoments.quote: Both teams are allowed to use weapons, and can do anything!

keyMoments.title: Explains Donut Race Rules
keyMoments.description: Itomimizu comprehensively explains the rules of the Donut Race, including the brutal allowance for any means of sabotage.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial information about how the competition works and what's at stake.
keyMoments.quote: Both teams are allowed to use weapons, and can do anything, including pushing the other boat backwards, do damage to the other boat and even kill all the members of the opposing team.

relationships.description: Itomimizu rides on Chuchun, his giant Super Sparrow, to get aerial views of the Davy Back Fight events.

evolutionMoments.description: Itomimizu debuts riding Chuchun during the Donut Race.

reveals.information: Official announcer and referee of the Davy Back Fight

keyMoments.title: Chuchun Debuts as Itomimizu's Mount
keyMoments.description: Chuchun, a giant Super Sparrow, appears carrying Itomimizu to provide aerial commentary of the Davy Back Fight.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the means for the announcer to observe and commentate on the race from above.

abilities.description: As a Super Sparrow, Chuchun can fly while carrying Itomimizu to provide aerial observation.

relationships.description: Chuchun serves as Itomimizu's mount and transportation.

evolutionMoments.description: Chuchun carries Itomimizu during the Davy Back Fight announcements.

reveals.information: Super Sparrow - a giant bird species

keyMoments.title: Capote Debuts as Foxy Pirates Racer
keyMoments.description: Capote, a billfish fish-man, is introduced as one of the three members of the Foxy Pirates' Donut Race team aboard the Cutie Wagon.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a fish-man competitor who will use his aquatic advantages in the water-based race.

keyMoments.title: Uses Kaimen Wari Technique
keyMoments.description: Capote demonstrates his Fish-Man Karate technique, using a karate chop to create shock waves that slice through the ocean surface.
keyMoments.significance: First display of Fish-Man Karate in the Davy Back Fight, showing the combat techniques available to the Foxy Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Creates Two-Fish Engine with Monda
keyMoments.description: Capote places his legs in Monda's mouth, creating a powerful propulsion system that dramatically increases their boat's speed.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates unique teamwork between fish-man and sea creature, showcasing the Foxy Pirates' experience.

abilities.description: A Fish-Man Karate technique where Capote uses a karate chop to generate a shock wave that slices the ocean surface.
Capote places his legs in Monda's mouth, creating a powerful swimming engine that dramatically increases speed.
As a fish-man, Capote possesses strength ten times that of humans, and double that in water.

relationships.description: Capote works closely with Monda to create the Two-Fish Engine during the race.

evolutionMoments.description: Capote and Monda demonstrate their combination technique in the Donut Race.

relationships.description: Capote races alongside Porche in the Cutie Wagon during the Donut Race.

evolutionMoments.description: Capote and Porche work together as part of the Foxy Pirates' racing team.

keyMoments.title: Monda Debuts as Racing Shark
keyMoments.description: Monda, a Star Shark with orange coloring and yellow stars, is introduced as the aquatic power pulling the Cutie Wagon in the Donut Race.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a unique sea creature that provides the Foxy Pirates with a major advantage in the water-based competition.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Two-Fish Engine
keyMoments.description: Monda combines with Capote by taking the fish-man's legs in his mouth, dramatically increasing swimming speed and power.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the unique synergy between Monda and Capote that gives the Foxy Pirates a competitive edge.

abilities.description: Monda takes Capote's legs in his mouth, combining their swimming power to achieve extreme speeds.
As a Star Shark, Monda is a powerful natural swimmer capable of pulling boats at high speeds.

relationships.description: Monda works closely with Capote, serving as his partner in the Two-Fish Engine technique.

evolutionMoments.description: Monda and Capote demonstrate their combination technique during the Donut Race.

reveals.information: Star Shark - an orange shark with yellow stars

keyMoments.title: Uses Ocho Fleur: Flip
keyMoments.description: Robin demonstrates a new Hana Hana no Mi technique, sprouting eight arms to grab and flip Capote upside down to counter his Fish-Man Karate attack.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's combat versatility and her ability to counter physical attackers using her Devil Fruit powers.

abilities.description: Robin sprouts eight arms - six to hold the opponent and two from their lower back - to flip them upside down so they fall on their head.

reveals.information: New Hana Hana no Mi technique: Ocho Fleur: Flip

keyMoments.title: Participates in Donut Race
keyMoments.description: Nami serves as the navigator for the Barrel Tiger, using her knowledge of ocean currents and weather to compete against the Foxy Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's crucial role as navigator even in competitive racing situations.

keyMoments.title: Strategic Use of Impact Dial
keyMoments.description: Nami recognizes when to use their trump card, urging Usopp to deploy the Impact Dial at critical moments to overcome obstacles.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's tactical thinking and leadership during the race.
keyMoments.quote: Use the Impact Dial again! It's the only way to win!

keyMoments.title: Uses Impact Dial in Race
keyMoments.description: Usopp employs the Impact Dial obtained from Skypiea to give the Barrel Tiger massive speed boosts at crucial moments in the race.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how equipment from previous adventures remains useful and demonstrates Usopp's role as the crew's gadget specialist.
